I'd characterize it as the Trump

that we're gonna see this relationship

I think this is basically about a very

what I think this is is that there was a

how disappointed are you personally

of the policy and engagement to see it

they got their expectations up they
thought after December 17 things are
gonna get better now we're in a new era
and there were signs of progress so

on their lives
the Cubans who owned restaurants and

50 years and putting them in a box makes

transform Cuba into
years it was going to allow for an

and when I think about who that could be
